[Qovic Online Solutions LLP](https://qovic.com/) - Web hosting, Virtual Servers, Dedicated Servers, WHMCS Modules, Server Management.

**Los Angeles - 1 IPv4 | IPv6 on-request | 1Gbps uplink | Free DDoS protection 5Gbit/s**

Plan: 256MB SSD | 1 vCPU | 256MB RAM | 10GB SSD | 250GB Bandwidth | $2/mo | **[Order Now](https://qovic.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=38)**
Plan: 512MB SSD | 1 vCPU | 512MB RAM | 20GB SSD | 500GB Bandwidth | $3.50/mo | **[Order Now](https://qovic.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=39)**
Plan: 1GB SSD | 2 vCPU | 1GB RAM | 35GB SSD | 1TB Bandwidth | $4.50/mo | **[Order Now](https://qovic.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=40)**
Plan: 2GB SSD | 2 vCPU | 2GB RAM | 70GB SSD | 2TB Bandwidth | $7/mo | **[Order Now](https://qovic.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=41)**

**Test IP / Looking Glass**
[Los Angeles, CA](http://lg.lax.psychz.net/)

**About Us**
Formed and operational since 2016 as a registered LLP situated in India. Qovic connects the dots between business and IT making the process of marking your presence online a breeze.

**24x7 Support**
Normally we have proactive monitoring in place for all our servers, even so, if you should face any problem we're always available on-call vide our phone number +91 40 4033 99 83. We're always available to take your call(s) with utmost priority. (You can call us to even say Hi!)

**Why Us?**
We maintain our own hardware, as such have full control and proper SLA in place to sort any hardware/network issues which may or may not arise.

**Payment Methods**
We accept PayPal, Alipay, Credit/Debit cards via Razorpay, Bitcoin and even bank transfer.
